title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout
description:
Build 2002071610021.

When deleting items from the coolbar, the layout gets corrupted.
OB:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs.
EB:
1. Press the Delete button.
2. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs.
3. The second row should remain unchanged.
SR:
1. Open the coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe the layout to see if the second row gets removed.
